comments:
Using IBM JRE 1.5, attempt to profile the workbench using JVMTI's memory analysis option.  I got the following exception in the console:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.VerifyError: stack shape inconsistent (class: org/eclipse/equinox/launcher/Main method: setSecurityPolicy([Ljava/net/URL;)V) at pc: 93
	at java.lang.J9VMInternals.verifyImpl(Native Method)
	at java.lang.J9VMInternals.verify(J9VMInternals.java:59)
	at java.lang.J9VMInternals.initialize(J9VMInternals.java:120)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:24)

I got a similar error with Sun-1.5.0_10:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.VerifyError: (class: org/eclipse/equinox/launcher/Main, method: setSecurityPolicy signature: ([Ljava/net/URL;)V) Expecting to find object/array on stack
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:24)

This is a known issue and has been deferred to enable the Probekit against JVMTI to be complete. This defect manifests itself in certain cases. 



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 175695 ***
Updated target to match the iteration when this defect was processed

traces.message: stack shape inconsistent (class: org/eclipse/equinox/launcher/Main method: setSecurityPolicy([Ljava/net/URL;)V) at pc: 93
(class: org/eclipse/equinox/launcher/Main, method: setSecurityPolicy signature: ([Ljava/net/URL;)V) Expecting to find object/array on stack
